reviews.review_msg: As someone who got 56% in Physics 11 Eldon's very clear explanations and solid notes made physics easy. Lectures are engaging and entertaining. Online Textbook for free so that's a plus :D Although after a lecture is missed it may be difficult to follow along and understand so just show up and get the A.

His class was probably the only class that I enjoyed going to because it had a  highschool vibe. Midterms were based on textbook questions so make sure you do those daily so u don't have 100's of questions to do last minute. FINAL WAS BRUTAL. Did not resemble his midterms at all. So long, and difficult. :( hopefully he scales.
Very cool prof - I decided to take more physics classes after this - young profs always seem nicer
This teacher makes no sense, he uses Looney Toon cartoons as his explanations.  I'm completely lost this year in physics, and I blame him!!  Horrible teacher!  Don't take him if you don't have to.
Jeff was a very caring prof. His exams were much easier than any of the homework or tutorials.
If you want to take Physics? Run away from him. The lectures were easy, but the exams were really hard.
Good attitude towards students and teaching, however expect difficult midterms and a brutal final exam.
A wonderful teacher genuinely wants to see his students' succeed. Reza thinks no questions are small or trivial. He fosters inquiring mind & engages his students in active learning.
